title: Use of electronic or other means for drawing grand and trial juries
context: ยง612-26 Use of electronic or other means for drawing grand and trial juries. Selections of citizens who are subject to jury duty and drawings of jury lists, may be made by electronic data processing or any other method to ensure random selection of jurors and implement the purposes of this chapter. [L 1973, c 191, pt of ยง1; am L 1993, c 159, ยง6; am L 2007, c 122, ยง17]
